title: Measure, consequence, policy of income inequality

content.question: Identify one indicator that measures income inequality. Describe one political consequence of income inequality. Describe a policy that governments use to reduce income inequality.

frqParts.text: Identify one indicator that measures income inequality. Describe one political consequence of income inequality. Describe a policy that governments use to reduce income inequality.

unit.text: 5: Political and Economic Changes and Development

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
